reviews.text: Hi Wendy,Thank you so much for the review! And thanks for sharing your photos, Whitehaven Beach is truly stunning. We're glad you enjoyed your day out with us in the Whitsundays!Warm regards,Whitsunday Bullet Team
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Hi Kaszandra,Thank you so much for your review! We love to hear from guests who had a great time on our tour. Sorry you didn't get to see a whale, it is the tail end of the Whitsunday whale season so most of them are probably well on their way back to Antarctica by now. But so glad you got to see a turtle and had an amazing day regardless!Warm regards,Whitsunday Bullet Team
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Hi Jackie,Thank you for your detailed review and lovely photos. So glad to hear you had a fantastic day at beautiful Whitehaven Beach with our crew!Warm regards,The team at Whitsunday Bullet
reviews.author: Customer
